import React from 'react'; import {AppBar, Toolbar, IconButton, Badge, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import ShoppingCartSharpIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingCartSharp'; import {Grid} from '@material-ui/core' import useStyles from './style'; import InputBase from '@material-ui/core/InputBase'; const NavBar = ({totalItems}) => { const classes= useStyles(); return (
Nome Store
) } export default NavBar
